Class Errorâ€‹Box 

@objc(MKBErrorBox) public class ErrorBox: NSObject

Used to forward errors thrown from stubbed implementations to the Objective-C runtime.

SwiftErrorBox

Holds Swift errors which are bridged to NSErrors.
